JOB DESCRIPTION  
 Job Title: Senior Developer 
 Reporting To: Development Manager 
 Location: Bangalore
  We are looking for an experienced software developer to join our high- performance agile development team enhancing and maintaining our suite of Care delivery products. You will need solid experience of working on enterprise level solutions with an emphasis on quality and automated testing. You will be using a range of development tools and languages,  from rich client applications written in C# .Net ,  sophisticated distributed back- end processing systems written in C# .NET and front- end technologies.
 As a Senior Developer you would be an ambitious high- achiever who has wide development background and strives for technical excellence from yourself and your team. Your key skill will be the delivery of high quality product increments through good agile development practices using a collaborative approach.
  Main Duties and Responsibilities  

 Work with analysts,  IT professionals and other developers to coordinate large- scale development projects and meet deadlines. 
 Under the guidance of the Technical Lead design and develop application architecture that is scalable,  reliable,  available and manageable. 
 Define interactions between application packages,  databases,  and middleware systems in terms of functional coverage. 
 Promote Agile and Test Driven Development practices within the team,  ensuring that Unit Test and Acceptance Tests are implemented to confirm that acceptance criteria (i.e. system behaviours) are met. 
 Work with the Technical Lead to develop deployment strategy and enforce technical standards and tooling. Continually look for and drive improvement to processes and tooling.
